title: General form of exponential function
text: In the general form of the function f(x) $$=$$ $$a b^{x+c}+d$$, a vertically $$\frac{stretches}{shrinks}$$ the function, c translates the function to the left or right, and d translates the function up or down.

title: Vertical translations
text: The function f(x) $$=$$ $$a b^{x+c}+d$$ is being translated upwards by d units.

title: Identifying d
text: What is the value of d in our given equation?

title: Horizontal translations
text: The function f(x) $$=$$ $$a b^{x+c}+d$$ is being translated c units to the left.

title: Identifying c
text: What is the value of c in our given equation?
